thread.title: Kuwait Airways to resume Beirut flights

title: Kuwait Airways to resume Beirut flights
text:
April 14, 2018 / 1:47 PM / in an hour Kuwait Airways to resume Beirut flights Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
DUBAI (Reuters) - Middle East carrier Kuwait Airways said on Saturday it would resume all flights to Beirut on Sunday after a three-day suspension due to warnings about flying close to Lebanese airspace. 
In a statement carried by the state news agency KUNA, the company said “the reasons that caused the suspension have removed.” 
Cyprus authorities made the warning on Thursday, the company said, following an announcement two days earlier from Europe’s air traffic control agency that asked carriers flying over the eastern Mediterranean to exercise caution due to air strikes into Syria. Reporting By Aziz El Yaakoubi; Editing by Toby Chopra
